description: This file defines a Java class named AuditAware that provides auditing metadata such as created and modified timestamps and user information. It is used as a base class for entities requiring audit tracking, utilizing Spring Data JPA auditing annotations.

classes.name: AuditAware
classes.description: A base class for JPA entities that require auditing fields such as creation and modification timestamps and user identifiers. Implements Serializable and utilizes Lombok annotations for getter and setter methods.

methods.name: getModifiedDate
methods.description: Getter for the last modification timestamp.

methods.name: setModifiedDate
methods.description: Setter for the last modification timestamp.

methods.name: getModifiedBy
methods.description: Getter for the last modifier's identifier.

methods.name: setModifiedBy
methods.description: Setter for the last modifier's identifier.

methods.name: getVersion
methods.description: Getter for the entity version for optimistic locking.
